About.title: About Me
About.description: I am a beginner learning Next.js, and this project is my first Next.js project. I hope you like it.

parse.success: Verification successful! You can now download the file.
parse.inputUrlHint: Please enter a valid Baidu Netdisk link
parse.inputPasswordHint: Please enter a valid extraction code
parse.parseError: Parsing failed, please check the link and extraction code
parse.title: Cloud Parse

step3.title: Download File
step3.description: Click the download button to download the file

1.question: Why did parsing fail?
1.answer: Please check if the link and extraction code are correct

2.question: What to do if password verification fails?
2.answer: Visit the official account to get the latest password

3.question: What to do if parsing verification fails?
3.answer: Try clearing browser cache or changing browser

4.question: What to do if RPC connection fails?
4.answer: Please click How to Use and follow the tutorial to connect RPC

Download.title: Cloud Parse Download
Download.description: Quickly download Baidu Netdisk files, supporting both API and RPC download methods
Download.rpcAddressHint: Please enter a valid RPC address
Download.noFiles: Please parse the link first, redirecting...

HomePage.title: FBD
HomePage.about: FBD is a Baidu Netdisk parsing tool that supports quick parsing of Baidu Netdisk links and provides download functionality.
HomePage.keywords: Baidu Netdisk, Parse, Download, Cloud Storage

features.fastDesc: Fast parsing, no waiting, instant download links
features.stableDesc: Stable and reliable, 99.9% parsing success rate
features.simpleDesc: Simple to use, complete file download in three steps

placeholder.linkInput: Please enter Baidu Netdisk share link

Footer.title: FBD
Footer.description: FBD is a Baidu Netdisk parsing tool that supports quick parsing of Baidu Netdisk links and provides download functionality.
Footer.keywords: Baidu Netdisk, Parse, Download, Cloud Storage
